statements: SELECT id, company_name, revenue FROM financial_data;
SELECT date, profit, company_name FROM financial_data;
SELECT company_name, profit, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 100000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT company_name, profit FROM financial_data ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT company_name, revenue, profit FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 100000 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT company_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_data GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_revenue > 500000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT company_name, AVG(profit) AS average_profit FROM financial_data GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY average_profit DESC;
SELECT company_name, date, revenue, profit FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > profit AND date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY date DESC, revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, profit FROM FinancialData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, expenses FROM FinancialData ORDER BY expenses DESC;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM FinancialData;
SELECT date, revenue_growth FROM GrowthMetrics WHERE user_growth > 1000;
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM FinancialData WHERE profit > 5000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, expenses, profit FROM FinancialData WHERE revenue BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000 ORDER BY profit ASC;
SELECT date, revenue_growth, user_growth FROM GrowthMetrics WHERE user_growth > 1000 ORDER BY revenue_growth DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, revenue_growth, market_share FROM GrowthMetrics WHERE market_share < 0.1 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, date, revenue, expenses, profit FROM FinancialData WHERE revenue + expenses > profit ORDER BY date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, revenue + expenses AS total_profits FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT * FROM financial_forecast WHERE predicted_revenue > 50000;
SELECT AVG(predicted_expenses) AS avg_expenses FROM financial_forecast;
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_revenue FROM financial_forecast WHERE predicted_expenses < 20000 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM financial_forecast ORDER BY predicted_revenue DESC
SELECT trend_date, growth_rate FROM growth_trends WHERE growth_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY trend_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, date, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses
SELECT * FROM financial_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM financial_data;
SELECT expense, date FROM financial_data WHERE expense > 10000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_revenue FROM revenue_forecast WHERE forecasted_revenue > 50000;
SELECT trend_type, trend_value, trend_date FROM growth_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Sales' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 10000 AND expense < 5000 ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecasted_revenue FROM revenue_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, trend_type, trend_value, trend_date FROM growth_trends WHERE trend_value < 0 ORDER BY trend_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE metric_value >= 50000 AND metric_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT revenue, expenses FROM historical_financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT date, forecasted_revenue, confidence_level FROM revenue_forecast WHERE confidence_level >= 0.8;
SELECT trend_analysis, growth_rate FROM growth_trends WHERE date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM financial_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT revenue, expenses, profit FROM historical_financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses
SELECT date, growth_rate FROM growth_trends WHERE growth_rate > 0 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT date, market_segment FROM market_analysis WHERE market_segment = 'Technology'
SELECT * FROM financial_metrics JOIN historical_financial_data ON financial_metrics.date = historical_financial_data.date ORDER BY financial_metrics.metric_name
